description: Pizza Zilla  South Florida's #1 Pizza Truck!  Specializing in 'Godzilla' sized New York Style slices, subs, personal pies, fried foods, & desserts!  Some fan favorites include XXL NY Style Cheese or Pepperoni Slice, BBQ Meatlovers Pizza, 9" Meatball Sub, Mozzarella Sticks w/ Fries, & our chocolate chip cannolis dipped in chocolate! Stop by to get your first taste! Available for all events - public or private! Store Sales, Church gatherings, Movie Nights, School fundraisers, marathons, concerts, art galleries, & more!!!!CONTACT PizzaZillaMiami@gmail.com for all requests!!!!  Follow us on facebook, instagram, twitter, & vine @pizzazillamiami !!!
name: Pizza Zilla
